name: Shamanigans
description:
A game about a tiny shaman apprentice attempting to juggle the needs of multiple gods to keep everybody happy. 

LEFT/RIGHT: move around the world UP: pick an object up OR use it on a nearby object DOWN: put an object down

Some guidelines:

  • Gods Kratos (blood), Loki (pranks) & Pyro (fire) like different actions and town has an opinion on its own
  • Generally, it’s best to slaughter, drown or burn bunnies to please gods, but there are other actions available too
  • Angry gods will start bringing up curses to the world, which won’t be liked by town either
  • Game ends after town gets fed up by this situation.

Let me know what you think and leave a rating!

Made for Ludum Dare 43 - "Sacrifices must be made"

https://twitter.com/SnoutUp
